import React, {ChangeEvent, useState} from 'react'; import {FilterValuesType} from './App'; type PropsType = { title: string tasks: Array removeTask: (taskId: string) => void changeFilter: (value: FilterValuesType) => void } type TaskType = { id: string title: string isDone: boolean } export function Todolist(props: PropsType) { let [inputValue,setInputValue]=useState('') const onClickHandlerInput = (event:ChangeEvent)=> { setInputValue(event.currentTarget.value) console.log(inputValue) } return

{props.title}

    { props.tasks.map(t =>
  • {t.title}
    • ) }
}
